title: Getting Started
explanation: TypeScript is JavaScript with syntax for types. It helps catch errors early and makes code more maintainable.

codeBlocks.title: Installation & Setup
codeBlocks.code:
# Install TypeScript globally
npm install -g typescript

# Check version
tsc --version

# Create a TypeScript file
touch index.ts

# Compile TypeScript to JavaScript
tsc index.ts

# Watch mode (auto-compile on save)
tsc index.ts --watch

# Initialize tsconfig.json
tsc --init

tip: Always use a tsconfig.json for projects. It centralizes compiler options and makes your project more maintainable.
